attributes.action: The laws and court guidelines to remove children need to be changed
attributes.additional_details: This can mean children suffer emotionally and psychologically more in the long term. Currently a court can grant a care order removing children from their parents if they are 'likely to suffer harm or future harm'.
attributes.background: This can mean children suffer emotionally and psychologically more in the long term. Currently a court can grant a care order removing children from their parents if they are 'likely to suffer harm or future harm'.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634591
